About to hand in notice, yaaaaaay

Speaking of work, off I go.
But at this point, this place has worn away my last nerve.
I also still have outstanding applications to DoorDash and GrubHub.
yeah, I swear there should be some sort of mechanism to getting some downtime after leaving poorly managed jobs
At this point I SWEAR it's corporate...
That said, I am getting some time off, haha
like, enough people should be able to raise a grievance to a labor bureau or something
Instacart gives you 45 days after either signing on or being approved to make a delivery before they remove you for inactivity
If it's starting the application, I'm good until the end of January.
If it's when I was officially given the green light, then I've got 40 days, lmao
Use the non terrible winter weather to your advantage though
On top of that... I've built up quite a bit of money in my bank account thanks to the freeze on federal student loans
Which was once again extended until the end of january
Seriously, just extend it on a 3-month basis...
Don't do this thing where we near the end of the current freeze and it's like, "We pushed it back a month."
Eh that tells you how disorganized everything is

Slept until 1pm the next day, went in to work, didn't get home until 1am, went to sleep at roughly 2, and slept until 2 the next day :\
